text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 1..*Extension(4.0.1)Vaccine administration recommendations
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:vaccineCode 0..*ExtensionVaccine or vaccine group recommendation applies to
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.vaccineCode"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptVaccine or vaccine group recommendation applies to
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-vaccine-code-for-R4 (example): The type of vaccine administered.
extension:targetDisease 0..*ExtensionDisease to be immunized against
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.targetDisease"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptDisease to be immunized against
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-immunization-target-disease-for-R4 (example): The disease that the recommended vaccination targets.
extension:contraindicatedVaccineCode 0..*ExtensionVaccine which is contraindicated to fulfill the recommendation
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.contraindicatedVaccineCode"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptVaccine which is contraindicated to fulfill the recommendation
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-vaccine-code-for-R4 (example): The type of vaccine administered.
extension:forecastStatus 1..1ExtensionVaccine recommendation status
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastStatus"
value[x] 1..1CodeableConceptVaccine recommendation status
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-immunization-recommendation-status-for-R4 (example): The patient's status with respect to a vaccination protocol.
extension:forecastReason 0..*ExtensionVaccine administration status reason
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastReason"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptVaccine administration status reason
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-immunization-recommendation-reason-for-R4 (example): The reason for the patient's status with respect to a vaccination protocol.
extension:dateCriterion 0..*ExtensionDates governing proposed immunization
Slices for extension 2..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:code 1..1ExtensionType of date
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.code"
value[x] 1..1CodeableConceptType of date
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-immunization-recommendation-date-criterion-for-R4 (example): Classifies date criterion with respect to conveying information about a patient's vaccination status (e.g. due date, latest to give date, etc.).
extension:value 1..1ExtensionRecommended date
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.value"
value[x] 1..1dateTimeRecommended date
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension
extension:description 0..1ExtensionProtocol details
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.description"
value[x] 0..1markdownProtocol details
extension:series 0..1ExtensionName of vaccination series
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.series"
value[x] 0..1stringName of vaccination series
extension:doseNumber 0..1ExtensionRecommended dose number within series
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber"
value[x] 0..1stringRecommended dose number within series
extension:seriesDoses 0..1ExtensionRecommended number of doses for immunity
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses"
value[x] 0..1stringRecommended number of doses for immunity
extension:supportingImmunization 0..*ExtensionPast immunizations supporting recommendation
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingImmunization"
value[x] 0..1Reference(Cross-version Profile for R5.Immunization for use in FHIR R4(0.0.1-snapshot-3) | Immunization | Cross-version Profile for R5.ImmunizationEvaluation for use in FHIR R4(0.0.1-snapshot-3) | ImmunizationEvaluation)Past immunizations supporting recommendation
extension:supportingPatientInformation 0..*ExtensionPatient observations supporting recommendation
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation"
value[x] 0..1Reference(Cross-version Profile for R5.Resource for use in FHIR R4(0.0.1-snapshot-3) | Resource)Patient observations supporting recommendation
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension

Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionImmunizationRecommendation_Recommendation
title: Cross-version Extension `R5.ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source element is defined as:
`ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` 1..* `BackboneElement`

Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as:
*  R5: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` 1..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4B: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` 1..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` 1..* `BackboneElement`

Following are the generation technical comments:
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`, but has no comparisons.

element.definition: Vaccine administration recommendations.
element.comment: A given instance of the .recommendation backbone element should correspond to a single recommended administration.

element.definition: Nominal position of the recommended dose in a series as determined by the evaluation and forecasting process (e.g. dose 2 is the next recommended dose).
element.comment: The use of an integer is preferred if known. A string should only be used in cases where an integer is not available (such as when documenting a recurring booster dose).
element.requirements:
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that the target element context `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber[x]`, but has no comparisons.

element.definition: Vaccine administration recommendations.
element.comment: A given instance of the .recommendation backbone element should correspond to a single recommended administration.

element.short: Vaccine  or vaccine group recommendation applies to

The targeted disease for the recommendation.
element.comment: A given instance of the .recommendation backbone element should correspond to a single recommended administration but sometimes that administration (e.g. MMR) will encompass multiple diseases, thus the targetDisease element is allowed to repeat.

Nominal position of the recommended dose in a series as determined by the evaluation and forecasting process (e.g. dose 2 is the next recommended dose).
element.comment: The use of an integer is preferred if known. A string should only be used in cases where an integer is not available (such as when documenting a recurring booster dose).
